
slides.title: Alerting Basics
slides.content:
# Grafana Alerting ğŸš¨

## Unified Alerting
- Grafana 8+ feature
- Multi-data source
- Alert grouping

## Alert Components
| Part | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| Alert rule | When to fire |
| Contact point | Where to send |
| Notification policy | Routing |
| Silences | Temporary mute |

## Rule Structure
```
Condition â†’ Evaluate â†’ Alert/Resolve
```

slides.title: Creating Alerts
slides.content:
# Alert Rules ğŸ“‹

## Example Rule
```yaml
name: High CPU
folder: infrastructure
condition: C
data:
  - refId: A
    query: node_cpu{mode="idle"}
  - refId: B
    reduce: last
    expression: A
  - refId: C
    type: threshold
    expression: B
    conditions:
      - type: lt
        value: 20
```

## Evaluation
- Every X seconds
- For duration (pending)
- No data handling

slides.content:
# Notification Policies ğŸ“¬

Route alerts to contact points.

## Policy Tree
```
Root Policy
â”œâ”€â”€ severity=critical â†’ PagerDuty
â”œâ”€â”€ team=frontend â†’ #frontend-alerts
â””â”€â”€ Default â†’ Email
```

## Settings
- **Grouping** - Combine related

## Grouping
```yaml

```
